title: Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: A Dog, After Having Killed an Elephant, Fights a Lion", ca. 1590
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and grey-brown wash
inscribed: Reverse: "Il Re di Albania dono (written over, struck out: dono) vn cane a Alessandro Magno che/attero un lione e un elefante lbo. 8. cop. 40/Plinio."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Alexander the Great watches from one of three boxes shown in the background.  A foot of a dog is shown below, at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: A Dog, After Having Killed an Elephant, Fights a Lion", ca. 1590.
ca. 1590. Pen and brown ink, brush and grey-brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2482.
